Text: I have scanned them all. This set of files are confirmed safe by norton Internet security 2013... I checked them twice to make sure they are safe...

I set used ZDOOM to improve windows compatibility and to get proper widescreen support.
Check out the ZDOOM project here: http://zdoom.org
I made the installers using Smart Install Maker.
My computer is free of viruses and such.
I am not part of any group, or site.  I have no interest in infecting anyone's computers.  I just wanted to share some updated classic games.
